thread.title: Zona euro, produzione industriale sale a novembre | Macroeconomia

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zona euro, produzione industriale sale a novembre | Macroeconomia
text: BRUXELLES, 11 gennaio (Reuters) - The European Union's statistics office Eurostat released the following data on industrial production in the 19 countries sharing the euro in November. Economists polled by Reuters had expected a rise of 0.8 percent month-on-month and 3.0 percent year-on-year. Industrial production % change compared with previous month Jun-17 Jul-17 Aug-17 Sep-17 Oct-17 Nov-17 EA19 Total industry -0.6 0.3 1.5 -0.5 0.4 1.0 Intermediate goods 0.0 0.6 1.2 -0.5 0.3 1.1 Energy 1.0 -1.1 0.9 -1.2 0.2 0.0 Capital goods -1.9 1.0 3.3 -1.6 -0.2 3.0 Durable consumer goods -1.3 0.9 1.5 -0.3 -2.1 1.6 Non-durable consumer goods -0.3 0.5 0.1 0.3 0.4 0.1 EU28 Total industry -0.5 -0.2 1.7 -0.5 0.5 0.9 Intermediate goods -0.2 0.6 1.0 -0.2 0.5 0.9 Energy 0.9 -1.0 1.1 -0.8 -0.2 0.4 Capital goods -1.5 0.4 3.4 -1.4 0.1 2.4 Durable consumer goods -0.9 0.2 1.4 0.2 -1.9 1.4 Non-durable consumer goods -0.3 0.1 0.4 -0.3 0.7 0.2 Industrial production % change compared with same month of the previous year Jun-17 Jul-17 Aug-17 Sep-17 Oct-17 Nov-17 EA19 Total industry 2.9 3.7 3.9 3.4 3.9 3.2 Intermediate goods 4.3 5.0 5.3 4.6 5.3 4.6 Energy 4.8 1.9 0.5 -1.1 -1.7 -3.4 Capital goods 1.5 4.6 5.1 4.5 3.5 6.2 Durable consumer goods 3.7 5.5 3.3 7.6 3.9 4.6 Non-durable consumer goods 0.9 0.5 2.5 1.5 5.4 -0.1 EU28 Total industry 3.2 3.4 4.1 3.7 4.2 3.5 Intermediate goods 4.4 5.0 5.3 4.6 5.7 4.8 Energy 3.4 0.5 0.9 0.4 -0.5 -2.0 Capital goods 2.6 4.9 5.8 4.7 4.5 6.8 Durable consumer goods 4.2 4.8 3.8 7.5 3.8 4.6 Non-durable consumer goods 1.7 0.6 2.4 1.7 4.6 0.3 (Reporting By Jan Strupczewski)
